title: E-Learning Adoption and Satisfaction Improvement Course in Pandemic Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Language learning course conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, targeting individuals with sudden e-learning transitions due to halted in-person classes

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of the extended TAM model (perceived usefulness, ease of use, IT self-efficacy, quality of life)
Learners can identify at least three technical barriers when using an LMS system in a smartphone environment
Learners can write self-assessment reports applying e-learning satisfaction criteria (content quality, technical stability, interactivity)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
